text: Tong-Kwang Light House Presbyterian Church () is the first Christian Church for Homosexuals in Chinese society. It is located in Taipei, Taiwan, and does not believe homosexuality to be a sin (see Homosexuality and Christianity). It was established on 5 May 1996. Although the church has a system of Presbyterianism, it is independent from the Presbyterian Church in Taiwan. The church also works with Taiwan Tongzhi Hotline Association, and attends Taiwan Pride. ==See also== *LGBT-welcoming church programs ==External links== * Tong- Kwang Light House Presbyterian Church Category:1996 establishments in Taiwan Category:LGBT churches in Taiwan Category:Presbyterian congregations established in the 20th century Category:Christian organizations established in 1996
title: Tong-Kwang Light House Presbyterian Church
